name: Spaceshift (MartinCirice)
description:
Hi! I'm Martin, and it's my second time submitting a game for the TriJam! I still use this pretext to learn to use Godot engine and practice pixel art. This time, I also tried to make some sounds! It's basic, but I'm happy with the result. Next step might be music, but making a good soundtrack in 3 hours while also making a game in parallel seems super hard.

The development time was 3 hours, and the time to make the assets and the sounds was 3 hours too. So 6 hours in total.

Thanks for playing!

Pre-made assets

Font: https://www.dafont.com/minecraftia.font
